programme.title: At the Centre of Things
programme.short_synopsis: Whilst visiting San Francisco, Alistair Cooke muses on the ego-centric lives of city folk.
programme.medium_synopsis: Upon visiting San Francisco, Alistair Cooke reflects on the ego-centric lives of city dwellers and the great assumptions that they make on a daily basis.

programme.title: Letter from America by Alistair Cooke
programme.short_synopsis: Alistair Cooke’s weekly talks on American life, history and politics from 1946 – 2004.
